text:
Our hope is that the #COVID19 vaccine will get ready in 18 months!

They say it takes time to develop a #vaccine, but how long? Also, why does it take time? 

Watch this to understand the time frame and the various steps of a vaccine's development!

📽️https://t.co/7AIOitwLSm https://t.co/CLJBNs4uiT
